GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.17 to before v5.15.25
GSD.description:
mtd: rawnand: gpmi: don't leak PM reference in error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.25 by commit 4a7ec50298b1127c5024a750c969ea0794899545, it was introduced in version v5.15.17 by commit 0fe08bf9909f02eb487af2cc829f2853ea69bc96. For more details please see the references link.
